Overcompensated
30 Sep 2021

Compound

A Compound governance proposal contained a bug which allowed for the distribution of ~$80M in excess COMP rewards. Mistakes were made, but who lost out?

Hello World

To celebrate our one year anniversary, and to fund our future development, we have created 20 unique NFTs. Visit OpenSea now to view the full collection.

One year of rekt.news

Hello World

12 months have passed since our Hello World. This is your chance to own a piece of rekt.news. Our anniversary auction sale is now live.

Vee Finance - REKT
21 Sep 2021

Vee Finance - REKT

Top ten thievery. $34 million taken from Vee Finance earns them the number 7 spot on our leaderboard, yet nobody seems surprised. What’s normal for us is not normal elsewhere.

JayPegs Automart - REKT
18 Sept 2021

NFT - Sushi - JayPeg - REKT

A blue-chip rekt by a front-end attack. Remind us, which part of crypto is supposed to be “trustless”? Misplaced faith (temporarily) cost MISO $3.1 million.

MORE

Spotlight on Solana
13 Sep 2021

Solana - Spotlight

Was that Solana Summer? These cheaper, faster, centralised chains put the Ethereum "community" to the test. But are their claims accurate?

DAO Maker - REKT
06 Sep 2021

DAO Maker - REKT

DAO Maker meet their maker. Again. $4M lost, less than a month after losing $7M. If you get rekt on repeat then we have to say something...

Tomb Finance - REKT
03 Sep 2021

Fantom - Tomb Finance

The raid of Tomb Finance makes for Fantom's first fatality. The Tomb team say it wasn't a hack, but we’ll let the rekt readers be the judge of that.

Banksy Pranksy Scam
01 Sep 2021

Banksy - Pranksy - NFT

The Banksy Pranksy Scam caught the attention of even the mainstream media, but nobody tried to find the truth. Was it a publicity stunt, or "performance art"? We stop and search the suspects to find out more.

Cream - REKT

Inspector rekt back once again. $18.8M lost to a ghostface killer, this time from an old school DeFi protocol.

X-Token - REKT X2
30 Aug 2021

X-Token - REKT

Some sequels should never be written. Three months ago this team lost $24 million - in the same token, to the same attack technique. Why did they let it happen again?

A Piece of Art
27 Aug 2021

NFT - fractionalisation

Chop it up, pump the price, and ramp up the speculation. NFT Fractionalisation has arrived, and influencers are getting hilariously rich, but for how long?
